casebody.data:
ALLISON v. UNITED STATES. No. 454,

Mise.

Decided February 13, 1967. Petitioner pro' se. Solicitor General Marshall for the United States. Per Curiam.

. The motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and the petition for a writ of certiorari are granted. The judgment is vacated and the case is remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit with instructions to grant the petitioner an appeal with counsel.
